title: I've just realized these boards have been in BETA for  2 years now.
body:
http://m.memegen.com/3x1zgi.jpg

I think you've done enough testing.

replies.body: No, it's still full of bugs.

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rLyQlTdh,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-15T17:05:44.215+0000)
>
> No, it's still full of *idiots and trolls*

:-p
http://tribunal.na.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/maintenance.html

Forums of pretty much every single online game are like that, though.

Especially official ones.
{{champion:31}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:72}} "hi."
1/2 of them are arachnids.
This bugs me
And another one is definitely vertebrate.
shhh ples stahp D:
And Kha'Zix is an insect, not a bug (contrary to popular belief).
http://stream1.gifsoup.com/view4/2062270/dancing-bug-o.gif
The search bar might as well still be in Alpha. Doesn't let you sort search results by date/views/comments etc. and on EUW it's even worse because it doesn't let you filter languages.
I also love how the filters it does have get dropped the instant you hit "Show More".
Yep... a multibillion dollar company and they couldn't hire ONE guy to do something about it? Gotta love Rito logic sometimes.

There's a search bar?
Did you mean Google perhaps?

I swear Boards search engine can't find a thread that was made 2 fucking seconds ago even if you copy-paste the freaking title.
Yi´s still in Alpha.

I get it I just hate you.

jk much love
Love you yoo <3
Death Recap has been in alpha for 7 years.

Meanwhile, us Mac players are sitting here wondering when we will get a proper, finished client....

I jest, it's long past the days where a now-Riot employee had users download 3rd part software just to keep the shit from hitting the fan.

The hilarious part about new game clients here is that since we will be getting one overall but if Mac users get a beta version of THAT one, too, we will weep.
I think your mistake may be having a Mac

Inb4 we find out boards developer is a dog... 

Oh wait, undertale was made by a dog... 

No excuses Rito get your shit together! 

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/undertale/images/7/7e/Sleepy_pup.gif/revision/latest?cb=20160125093758
Just like Silent Hills
Best secret ending ever in a game. So random I couldn't stop laughing for days after I found that ending lol.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cB6smM5CNGI
We should have been at Kappa by this time.
It's BETA 2.0 testing, duh!

Needs more data
http://w3af.org/wp-content/uploads/beta-testing.png

Testing wont ever end over until M&G becomes a sentient being!

https://media0.giphy.com/media/hokMyu1PAKfJK/200w.gif
At least they aren't releasing paid dlc for a beta like ark is.

I played Ark like a half a year ago and it was a really shitty game, even for a beta.
Not to mention the optimization was so bad that I thought my PC was going to explode.

Still can't understand how people can vouch for that game.

DLC in beta, though...  that's a whole new level of dickassery.
Paid DLC... In a Beta?

> [{quoted}](name=Aqualious18,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=rLyQlTdh,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-09-15T18:02:36.618+0000)
>
> Paid DLC... In a Beta?

So they can test paid dlc rollout for when the game is fully released... they to have been in beta over a year...
reminds me of when smite was in "close beta" for over 2 years

Incorrect. 2 years ago was when Riot migrated to these boards from the old forums. Before that, they were called the Community Beta, which has existed for at least [3 years](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/TM7V1kFa-different-terrain).
And it still switches back to the look when you click the "Game Info"-tab. Tencent, plz.

heh heh heh, ssssssssssshhhhhhhhhhhhh.

But really I forgot that. I remember alot of people hating these boards at first too.
Well the search function is ass...
https://38.media.tumblr.com/075e74a4bfb054e08956c9751c15af3c/tumblr_ngnd97QdBQ1sx331no1_400.gif
Ah Grineer, I'd sooner have a cactus guard my important data files.
As long as that cactus stays close to the walls...
Ok
Meme link?

http://m.memegen.com/3x1zgi.jp

just ad a G at the end for the link but if you want the image 

I'll put it in the OP.
They haven't figured out how best to stealth downvote and remove negative opinion to create the perfect reddit simulator yet. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Its not in beta. 
*IT IS  A BETA*
The Alpha is the old boards, known as the Forums.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
That's the way of things these days. Early acess, beta forever.

In all seriousness, guess they are waiting for the mobile app for boards to come out.

And for that they are waiting the client release. And i suppose more users too.
